name: Math Fun
description:
Math Fun is amazing fun loving app for everyone. This app will let you learn math in an fun and easy manner while playing.

Features
-High Quality Graphics in the App.
-Play & Learn Addition, Subtraction, Division, Multiplication, Counting and Comparison.
-In each Category there are 10 Levels. (Demo Version has 3 Levels).
-Suitable for all age group.
-Fully Tested on Windows 7 & above.
-Ratings & Feedback Appreciated.
